name: Appalachian Pumpkin Patch Country Farm Landscape Print
description:
A rural appalachian country farm landscape with mountains and farm, fields, and orchards in the background and a pumpkin patch in the foreground, painted in oil on canvas. Size is 16" x 20", created 2007.

Free shipping to the continental (lower 48 states) United States, Hawaii, Alaska and U.S. Territories. Please e-mail me for a shipping quote  if outside of the U.S. and Territories.

16"x 20" open edition museum quality giclee print with archival inks printed on premium archival matte paper. This heavyweight matte finish paper is engineered for high contrast and crisp reproduction of high resolution images. This print is produced on a state-of-the-art, professional-grade Epson printer, usiing acid-free paper and with archival inks to guarantee that your print will last a lifetime without fading or loss of color. This print includes a 1" white border around the image to allow for future framing and matting. Price includes shipping, print is shipped in a sturding cardboard tube. Ships within a week.

name: Springtime On The Farm Country Farm Landscape Print

Springtime On The Farm

Spring country farm landscape with bloodroot, violets in bloom, morel mushrooms and a homely groundhog in the foreground. An apple orchard and farmer doing the spring plowing in the middleground. name: Shucking And Storing Corn In The Corn Crib Rural Farm Landscape
description:
Shucking And Storing Corn In The Corn Crib 

After the harvest, family members are shucking corn and placing it in the corn crib,  the barn and smoke house are nearby.  Chickens are pecking, golden rod is blooming by the fence. Cows graze in the middleground and pastures trees and hills in the background. Size 16"x20", oil on canvas, created 2011.

name: Autumn Wheat Harvest Rural Country Farm Landscpa Print
description:
Autumn Wheat Harvest

A rural country farm landscape painting with hills, farm, and schoolhouse in the background and a little river running through. Farm, barns, cows, meadows, fields and wheat harvest in progress in the middleground. Looking down the path in the hills. Squirrels at play and a cricket a toad with an interest in the foreground. Size is 16"x20", oil on canvas, created in 2010.

description:

name: Autumn Apple Harvest Rural Country Farm Landscape print
description:
Autumn Apple Harvest

A farm family harvests the apple crop. Soon they'll store autumns bounty in the earthen cold cellar to supply grocery stores in surrounding towns through the winter months ahead. on the left in shadow is a Fence Lizard studying a grasshopper. This painting was just completed and is oil on canvas.

name: Deer in the High Meadow Rural Country Farm Landscape Print
description:
Deer in the High Meadow Rural Landscape

Take a stroll though the countryside and take in the rural appalachian country landscape with a chipmunk on a rock and deer in the high meadow in the foreground. cherokee roses, violets, muscadine vines and mountain laurel abound. You can see mountains and farm, fields, orchards and stream in the background. Painted in oil on canvas by me, Walt Curlee, created 2012.

name: Small Town Winter Landscape Print
description:
A rural winter country farm landscape painting showing a couple on their sleigh ride home (perhads from visiting freinds or just a ride in the country), as late evening settles on the small town. Cardinals on a holly tree, a rabbit and squirrel look down from a wooded hill. Farms and mountains in the distance. Created 2012.

name: Baling The Hay Rural Country Farm Landscape Print
description:
Baling The Hay

A rural country farm landscape painting with a nostalgic look back to a simpler time. A farmer  on his John Deere tractor and hay baler is baling hay for the livestock. The hay will be stored in barns to feed the farm animals during the winter ahead. Cows grazing in the hilly meadows in the middleground and pastures, crops, trees and hills in the background. The original painting is 16"x20", oil on canvas and created in 2012.
